pull.title: [Wallet] remove "unused" ThreadFlushWalletDB from removeprunedfunds
pull.body:
Calling `ThreadFlushWalletDB` makes not much sense if an explicit flush is required. The function will return immediately because of the `fOneThread` (populated/thread started during AppInit).

Removing it for now.

(originally reported by @luke-jr in #8687)

events.body:
Good catch. A shame we didn't catch this in the review. Calling into another thread's main function is 100% of times a mistake.
utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8765/commits/c6f5ca822f1308983431bf1b3c91f8aaccff51a0
